snippet: After years of collecting items, Kevin McCrary had until Monday to finish clearing out his Upper East Side apartment and collect a $12,000 buyout.
abstract: Kevin McCrary, son of celebrities Tex McCrary and Jinx Falkenburg, meets deadline for buyout deal on his Upper East Side apartment by clearing it of items he had been hoarding for 30 years; McCrary, who faces eviction, has now collected the $12,000 buyout from building's management, most of which he says will go toward legal and storage fees.
lead_paragraph: After years of collecting items, Kevin McCrary had until Monday to finish clearing out his Upper East Side apartment and collect a $12,000 buyout.

headline.main: Hoarder Meets Clean-Out Deadline, Exchanging Key for Check
headline.print_headline: Hoarder Meets Clean-Out Deadline, Exchanging Key for Check
